title: 新功能建议
body:
可以设置有色遮罩层，比如米黄色。
You can set a colored mask layer, such as beige.

title: Auto mode not working after upgrade to Oreo
body: After an OTA upgrade from 7.0 (Nougat) to 8.1 (Oreo), the auto mode timer no longer works. Night screen still works if enabled manually. I have already turned off battery optimization in settings and I have not had any low memory issues. Any suggestions or is anyone else using auto mode in Oreo?

body: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ssr.nightlight.paid

title: Auto brightness failed to take effect
body:
Project Information
-Repository
https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb

-Project Name: Night screen

Expected Behaviour
Auto brightness should take effect when the time set is clocked

Actual Behaviour
Auto brightness failed to take effect when the time is clocked

How to reproduce
Download from playstore
Run the app
Select settings under auto mode
Set the time you want it to start
When the time set is clocked,it fails to take effect.


-Browser: Night screen
-Operating System:Android 7.0

Recording of the bug
https://youtu.be/mKQPigloj4Q

title: Night screen app not working when brighten up
body:
*EXPECTED BEHAVIOR*
 this app should be able to brighten or darken the screen when in set.this one of the functions of this app.

*ACTUAL BEHAVIOR*
when trying to brighten the screen or darken the screen, then the app does not work

*HOW TO REPRODUCE*
●install Night screen app
●open the app and try to brighten the screen
●then app did not working as usual.
●Browser: Night screen  Version:2.1.1
●operating system :android 7.0

*RECORDING BUG*
https://youtu.be/QEd6YHQh6vA

title: Updated fr (French) translation
body: I have translated your application into `fr` (*French*). Here is the xml: ```xml MMMM yyyy EEE dd MMM "OK" "Curseur circulaire des heures" "Curseur circulaire des minutes" Réglette circulaire pour les secondes "Sélectionner les heures" "Sélectionner les minutes" Sélectionnez les secondes Date Heure "Calendrier mensuel sous forme de grille" "Liste des années" "Sélectionnez un mois et un jour" "Sélectionnez une année" "<xliff:g id=\"ITEM\" >%1$s</xliff:g> sélectionné" "\"<xliff:g id=\"KEY\" >%1$s</xliff:g>\" supprimé" Night Screen Astuce: cliquez sur le bouton en haut à gauche pour activer Night Screen Activation auto. à %s. Arrêt à %s. Désactivé Paramètres Thème sombre Choisir un mode Mode sans autorisation Mode normal Mode système superposé Aucune autorisation requise. Mais il ne recouvre pas l\'écran de verrouillage, les barres d\'état et de navigation. Et il ne fonctionne pas sur Android 7.0. Mode recommandé. Il est stable, mais il ne recouvre pas la barre de navigation et empêche l\'utilisateur d\'appuyer sur \"Installer\" ou \"Autoriser\" dans une fenêtre de dialogue. Vous pouvez recouvrir à la fois les barres d\'état et de navigation. Cependant, il peut faire clignoter l\'écran dans certaines applications. Pourquoi ne puis-je pas accéder au mode avancé ? Depuis Android Oreo (8.0), le système limite strictement les permissions des fenêtres flottantes. Nous améliorerons peut-être le contrôle de la luminosité dans une prochaine version de Night Shift. Plus de détails Statut Activer À propos Auteur : Paper Airplane Dev - Fung Jichun "Night Screen peut vous aider à prévenir les méfaits de la lumière forte la nuit.\n La luminosité minimale sur certains appareils reste élevée nous pouvons donc la rendre plus faible en créant un masque sur l\'écran.\n \n Si vous souhaitez soutenir cette application, vous pouvez envoyer un peu d\'argent sur mon Alipay : fythonx\\@gmail.com" Dépôt Github : https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb\n Blog : http://feng.moe\n Sina weibo : @某烧饼\n Paypal : https://www.paypal.me/fython\n Designer logo : Google+ Youlun Zhai Soutenez financièrement l\'auteur via Alipay Activer Couvrir la barre d\'état Activer cela permet de couvrir le haut de l\'écran, mais peut requérir une autorisation sur certains appareils (tels que MIUI et Android 6.0)\n Si cela ne fonctionne pas, veuillez autoriser à cette application d\'afficher la fenêtre d\'alerte système. Impossible de démarrer le masque. Veuillez vérifier si le système a refusé les autorisations. Première exécution Pouvez-vous voir ce message ? Si oui, cela prouve que Night Screen fonctionne bien.\n Il s\'arrêtera automatiquement au bout de 5 secondes si vous n\'appuyez pas sur OK. Night Screen est en exécution Appuyez pour ouvrir les paramètres Night Screen est en pause Appuyez pour ouvrir les paramètres ou glissez pour arrêter Désactiver Activer Mode automatique Astuce L\'activation/désactivation automatique de Night Shift selon l\'heure pourrait ne pas fonctionner à cause du mode d\'économie d\'énergie (\"Doze mode\") introduit dans Android depuis sa version 6.0. En cas de problème, essayez de désactiver la fonction d\'optimisation de la batterie d\'Android. Accéder aux paramètres ``` --- *Translation made with [Stringlate](https://github.com/LonamiWebs/Stringlate).*

title: Update README.md
body:
Hi,

This small and useless PR adds two buttons to get your app on F-Droid and Google Play 👍

title: Switch off LEDs on buttons
body:
I have a Samsung S4 Mini which has buttons below the screen. When the Night Screen takes over the LEDs on the buttons stay on, so the phone is very bright.

It is possible, because other software like NightOwl switches off the button LEDs.

title: The quick toggle from the notification drawer is not working
is it possible to draw overlay in status bar on Oreo?
body:
I know Oreo is not allowing any apps to draw overlay in some system ui like status bar and notification panel.
This issue affect me a lot when i am using my phone at night.

But is it still possible to draw overlay if with root access?
if it is possible, will this app implement this feature?

really need this!

title: make toggle icon bigger
body:
make toggle icon bigger, the current one is that small in my xperia XC 6.01,
and Blackbulb can't auto toggle dark mode in the time that I set in auto-switch

title: spelling correction
body:
"brithness" -> brightness
This text is seen in Fdroid introduction

title: Update strings.xml
body: 最佳化正體中文翻譯品質

title: Can't find manual toggle on new version
body: Where is the manual toggle? I have auto mode off and would like to enable night screen at will. There still a button for this?

title: localized app name in Play Store
body:
In my environment, this app name has been default name "Night Screen", not "夜用画面" as Japanese translated name.
![nightscreen-playstore-ja](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17121615/33173795-c8ee6b1c-d098-11e7-94be-485a364b9c98.png)

But the installed app name is localized name.
![nightscreen-in-homes-ja](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17121615/33174117-fb4de7c6-d099-11e7-8f92-c158014c2b87.png)

Therefore, users may not be able to find this app in their apps list.

So I think it would be better for this app name in Play Store to be localized. 
It seems that Google Play Developer Console provides the settings to localize app name in Play Store.

Thanks.

title: update Japanese translation
body:
Hi, Night Screen app team.

This PR includes new strings and miner improvements for Japanese translation.
Would you check this?
Thanks.

title: White status bar for Oreo
body:
Since Oreo doesn't let developers create overlays over system UI, the status bar white icons will be very visible. 

As a workaround, why not use a white status bar on all apps so that the white can be (somewhat) dimmed, but the undimmable dark gray icons are - well - dark gray anyway. 

Easiest way to see the difference is to toggle the dark theme on the app.

title: New version is completely broken (Samsung Galaxy S7, Android 7.0)
body:
The new update 2.1.0 doesn't dim the screen, and the quick settings menu button does not appear at all. The previous version was working perfectly.

(One of the crappy things about Android is that once you update an app you can't easily go back...)

title: [Feature Request] Grayscale mode
body: Recently I've been using "Simulate color space - Monochromacy" under Developer options in an effort to [reduce time spent on my device](https://redd.it/2x767y). I think this would be a nice addition to Night Screen as a checkbox somewhere, even in the "Mode" screen?

title: Add run at startup
body: It appears that after a device reboot the timer does not engage until the app is opened. Once opened, the timer works as expected. Will adding run at startup correct this?

body:
any plan for anti-flicker in Overlay System Mode?
if Root privilege given, can this issue be fixed?
Thanks.

title: Replacing topbar with toolbar
body:
In [this commit](https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb/commit/7d3fba1174c0e29bf08712dff857fe1550fbe1a5) I replaced the top bar with the toolbar and it was merged. However in the subsequent two commits, it was reverted back to using the top bar, the two commits being [this one](https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb/commit/0762b2b4dd77a53e1ba6686962adedad731c5f07) and [this one](https://github.com/fython/Blackbulb/commit/39bccce7127c61a2ca4bef2af879ac26465d9e40).

What happened? I feel that you didn't properly check the merge conflicts and hence all the work was overridden.

title: Feature request: Timer for activating/deactivating
body:
A timer to automatically activate/deactivate. Is this on the roadmap?
Thank you for the development!

title: Remove unnecessary conditionals for checking API level
body:
Closes #28 

Apparently it didn't too long to implement.

title: Unnecessary conditionals for checking API level
body:
There are many checks seeing whether the current version is ≥ Lollipop, Kitkat, and Honeycomb. As the `minSdkVersion` is 21, all of these checks are always true, making them redundant. A few classes can be deleted and the code can be simplified.

I'd be happy to work on this, but just want some confirmation whether this is something worth pursuing.

title: fix bug: maskView does not closed after pause
body:
1. fix bug:maskView does not closed after pause
2. move createMaskView() from MaskService.onCreate() to MaskService.onStartCommand(). I suppose that fython should have a look to check whether it is correct or not. Because I judge whether to run createMaskView() by whether mLayoutParams is null or not.

title: [建议]求支持“遮蔽导航栏”
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
只是遮蔽状态栏的话 overlay mode似乎也不是很有意义…依旧闪瞎眼
很多用户选择dimmer app的标准线就是看有没有遮蔽导航栏的功能呢

title: not an issue
label: [Label(name="question")]
body:
你好，个人对这个应用很感兴趣，看了你的源代码。发现不是太能理解。能给个大概的开发流程或者设计思路==

想自己实现个，因为自己的狗摩夜间模式效果太差==

title: 滑动滑条会出现崩溃
body:
Nexus 5 cm13 Android 6.0.1
我测了下是 discrete-seekbar 这个库的问题

title: 点击切换日/夜间按钮之后，屏幕全黑了
body:
设备：华为 H30-C00
系统：Android 4.3
详细情况：
AS 编译之后，安装到手机。点击日/夜间切换按钮，屏幕全黑，看不清屏幕。不过状态栏没有收到影响，正常显示。滑动 seekbar，设置为最大，情况还是这样。
图片：
![图片](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10471241/12711147/67af14e0-c8f8-11e5-940b-096b9e7bafb0.png)
